text: Richard Ulrich (born 1942) is a German board game designer. Many of his games have been nominated for or have won the Spiel des Jahres, a German games award. He is best known for co-authoring the board game El Grande with Wolfgang Kramer. ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Board game designers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:1942 births
title: Richard Ulrich
